column4: alex.... try this: http://monkeyblog.org/ubuntu/installing/ the part you want is about 60% down the page
alex -- if you dont know how to compile a package.... video editing in Linux will be beyond your abilities... (not a putdown, just a fact) ... Linux video editing apps aren't .... userfriendly...
have fun then alex... But before you try .. let me sprinkle some Holy Penguin Water on you .... In naminae Padre, Spiritu Linus, amen.

alex, if you think about it ... the amount of time you're spending trying to get someone to do it for you, you could be spending learning how to do it ..... then next time you need to compile something, you'd have no need to ask anyone... so it's actually less work to learn it that to ask for step-by-step handholding... oh and to answer your question, no.
besides, I saw 2 or 3 links, one of which I posted that would help you just fine.
well from 1st hand experience, the box is sweet.... good video card .. the 1 I got has 4gigs of ram... really runs smooth
i just picked up an HP limited edition with 4gb 64bit very nice
yup only issue is that darn flash player :)
well the adobe flash player doesn't support 64bit
yea it is the turion dual core 64bit
can't really say..had the laptop for an hour and put ubuntu on it...64 bit never tried the32 bit
